name: Boby In Miracle Land DEMO
description:
Boby In Miracle Land

is a platform game with crazy enemies, hard stages, big bosses and much more.

Z-jump X-attacks C-spin attack

arrows key: movement

Note: The game will have story mode, co-op or options

co-op is coming out soon

in options next will have how to change language for each country

and there will also be an in-game tutorial when you go into story mode just to clarify the game mechanics. after finishing the tutorial you go straight to first stage selection

the rest is in the game

MORE UPDATES ARE GOING TO BE ON GAME JOLT 

https://gamejolt.com/games/ayothepizzahere/509930
you can play without to install the .rar files 

https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/794042 and a newgrounds version too

and remember: the game is still in development

current version: 1.0.4 (11/02/2021)
